challenge.title: Robert Lustig - The Hacking of the American Mind
challenge.description: Robert Lustig's The Hacking of the American Mind explores the hacking of dopamine in the brain by physical and digital products to rewire the brain towards addictive behavior.
challenge.instructions: Use Archive.org E-Reserves to read Robert Lustig's The Hacking of the American Mind.
